description:
For the last 20 years I’ve been practicing the art of world building in fantasy literature, and in this online video course, I share with you some of the insights I’ve gained on that journey.

What we'll cover

This course will cover important areas of world building such as:

  • the guidelines for a creating a compelling world
  • how to address the challenge of world building
  • how establishing rules and creating depth will make your world more believable

What you’ll gain

When you have completed the course, you will be equipped with the knowledge of what it takes to build a believable and compelling world for your fantasy story—a world your readers will want to visit again and again.
title: World Building for Fantasy Writers
